Modules
Display APIs

Modules

 Display Handle Interface
 Display Control Interface

Detailed Description

The Display APIs include

  • Display handle functions: Retrieve the handle for the specified display.
  • Display control functions: Retrieve and control various display settings such as display name, refresh rate, hardware cursor, etc.
